snippet: Steven Stamkos had a goal and an assist during Tampa Bay's three-goal second period, Ben Bishop made 13 saves, and the Lightning beat the Buffalo Sabres 5-0 on Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: Stamkos, Bishop Key Lightning Past Sabres, 5-0
headline.main: Stamkos, Bishop Key Lightning Past Sabres, 5-0

lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos had a goal and an assist during Tampa Bay's three-goal second period, Ben Bishop made 13 saves, and the Lightning beat the Buffalo Sabres 5-0 on Thursday night.
